thread.title: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth hilariously photoshopped | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth hilariously photoshopped | Daily Mail Online

author: Hannah Paine For Daily Mail Australia
title: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth hilariously photoshopped | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The daring gown featured an over-sized bow at the back and was embellished with red sequinned hearts. That's one way to show your love! Miley chose to celebrate the romantic day on social media by sharing a hilarious photoshopped picture of her and Liam Miley paired the outfit with matching red gloves, posing sultrily for the camera on the red carpet. In the Wrecking Ball singer's version of the red carpet look, Liam's bearded head is superimposed over an image of Miley. The Aussie actor offers a smouldering stare for the camera, blithely unaware that his body has been photoshopped. Young romance: Liam and Miley first started dating in 2009 after falling in love on the set of The Last Song Miley captioned the photo with a message for her fans, writing: '@liamhemsworth & I wish you a VERY love V-Day.' Liam and Miley started dating in 2009 after falling in love on the set of The Last Song. They became engaged in 2012 when Miley was just 19, however, broke it off a year later. Ended it: They became engaged in 2012 when Miley was just 19, however, broke it off a year later 'At the time we were going in different directions and it’s just what needed to happen. We were both super young and it was a good decision at the time — we both needed that,' Liam revealed to GQ Australia. The couple rekindled their romance in late 2015, with Miley soon after spotted wearing her diamond engagement ring again. Giving it another go: The couple rekindled their romance in late 2015, with Miley soon after spotted wearing her diamond engagement ring again
